attributes.action: get first aid lessons onto the educational national curriculum
attributes.additional_details: I want to get First Aid onto the national curriculum so that from an early age studens in education and after will have the necessary skills to be able to help save someones life if the situation is to ever arise. as well as this I think that this could also help students leaving education a boost in their chances of becoming employed as appose to being on benefits such as Job Seekers Allowance. I can personally say that First Aid has given me and friends a boost and I have had a noticable increase in interview oppertunaties since I have gained my First Aid as well as the knowlage of how to prevent and deal with multiple illnesses and emergencies.
